alert.note: Alert for Butler; Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:13PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ripley and southwestern Butler Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 913 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Naylor, or 11 miles east of Doniphan, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fairdealing around 930 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
